thread.title: 'Moonlight' writer Tarell Alvin McCraney dedicates his Oscar win to those 'who don't see themselves '
thread.title_full: 'Moonlight' writer Tarell Alvin McCraney dedicates his Oscar win to those 'who don't see themselves '

title: 'Moonlight' writer Tarell Alvin McCraney dedicates his Oscar win to those 'who don't see themselves '
text:
Oscars 2017 live updates: 'Moonlight' and 'La La Land' face off for the final awards Feb. 26, 2017, 9 p.m. 
The Academy Awards honored Emma Stone, Casey Affleck, Mahershala Ali and Viola Davis in acting awards. Barry Jenkins won the adapted screenplay award for Tarell Alvin McCraney's "Moonlight" and Kenneth Lonnergan for his original script, "Manchester by the Sea." 
“La La Land” came into the night with 14 Oscar nominations including actor, actress, director and picture.
